from sympy.physics.vector import ReferenceFrame, Vector
from sympy import symbols

N = ReferenceFrame('N')

# Test case 1: Adding zero to a vector
result1 = N.x + (0 * N.x)
print("Test 1 - N.x + (0 * N.x):", result1)

# Test case 2: Adding a vector to zero
result2 = (0 * N.x) + N.x
print("Test 2 - (0 * N.x) + N.x:", result2)

# Test case 3: Adding multiple vectors with zeros
result3 = sum([N.x, (0 * N.y), N.z, (0 * N.x)])
print("Test 3 - sum([N.x, (0 * N.y), N.z, (0 * N.x)]):", result3)

# Test case 4: Adding zero to zero
result4 = (0 * N.x) + (0 * N.y)
print("Test 4 - (0 * N.x) + (0 * N.y):", result4)
\ No newline at end of file
